name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Quality Engineer with expertise in **CI/CD**, **Test Strategy**, and **Automation** gained over 13+ years in software development across healthcare and financial sectors. Proven skills in utilizing **GitHub Actions**, **Postman**, and **Cucumber** for effective quality assurance and regression testing. Experienced in Agile methodologies—including **Scrum** and **Kanban**—to enhance project delivery and team collaboration. Solid background in managing the Software Development Lifecycle, focusing on functional testing, bug tracking, and quality improvement.

Possesses strong full-stack development capabilities in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure** and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Specializes in MLOps, deploying AI/ML-powered platforms using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
